attributes.action: Support The Irish Survivors Of Child Abuse In Catholic Institutions
attributes.additional_details:
Urgent support for the Irish Survivors Of Child Abuse who were mentally, physically and sexually abused in Religious Institutions as children.
The majority residing in the U.K have been abandoned by the Irish Government and The Religious Orders.

We request that the Prime Minister shows his understanding and offers much needed assistance to the Survivors (most, now in retirement age, who face homeless, poor health and isolation.

We ask that the Prime Minister supports our attempt to challenge the original deal made for compensation between the Irish Government and Religious Orders, at The European Courts Of Human Rights.
